## [ContainerInfo](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/container-info)

### Methods

|                                                        Method                                                         | Return type |                                    Brief description                                     |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [getAnchorColumn()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/container-info#getAnchorColumn()) | `Integer`   | The chart's left side is anchored in this column.                                        |
| [getAnchorRow()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/container-info#getAnchorRow())       | `Integer`   | The chart's top side is anchored in this row.                                            |
| [getOffsetX()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/container-info#getOffsetX())           | `Integer`   | The chart's upper left hand corner is offset from the anchor column by this many pixels. |
| [getOffsetY()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/container-info#getOffsetY())           | `Integer`   | The chart's upper left hand corner is offset from the anchor row by this many pixels.    |
